sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {FormProvider, useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import Form from './form-reusable'; export default function ConfirmationPage({onSubmit,handleChange}) { const methods=useForm() const privacy={ name: 'privacy', title:'Privacy Declaration', options:['No','Yes'], change: handleChange, type:'select', require:true } return

* Please Read:

REVIEW ALL INFORMATION

Please ensure that the information you have provided is accurate and error free.

Pin the next step you will be required to confirm the accuracy of this information by providing an electronic signature.
; }
